description: This file defines an interface (abstract class) for a Butler component within the WPEFramework, including nested notification interface, methods for managing value points, and related operations.

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: Abstract interface for the Butler component, providing methods for managing value points and notifications.

classes.name: IButler::INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about changes to value points managed by the Butler.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification sink to receive updates about value point changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification sink.

methods.name: Element
methods.description: Retrieves a value point by name.

methods.name: Element
methods.description: Retrieves a value point by its ID.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Returns source information for a given module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Creates a branch at specified path.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Links a path to a specific ID.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Moves or renames a node at the specified path.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes the node at the specified path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Returns an iterator over orphaned value points for a module.

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
